description: ApiV4Definition is the Schema for the v4 apidefinitions API.

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.

spec.description: ApiV4DefinitionSpec defines the desired state of ApiDefinition.

analytics.description: API Analytics (Not applicable for Native API)

enabled.description: Analytics Enabled or not?

condition.description: The logging condition. This field is evaluated for HTTP requests and supports EL expressions.

content.description: Defines which component of the request should be included in the log payload.

headers.description: Should HTTP headers be logged or not ?

messageHeaders.description: Should message headers be logged or not ?

messageMetadata.description: Should message metadata be logged or not ?

messagePayload.description: Should message payloads be logged or not ?

payload.description: Should HTTP payloads be logged or not ?

messageCondition.description: The logging message condition. This field is evaluated for messages and supports EL expressions.

mode.description:
The logging mode defines which "hop" of the request roundtrip
should be included in the log payload.

endpoint.description: If true, the request to the upstream service will be included in the log payload

entrypoint.description: If true, the inbound request to the gateway will be included in the log payload

phase.description:
Defines which phase of the request roundtrip
should be included in the log payload.

request.description: Should the request phase of the request roundtrip be included in the log payload or not ?

response.description: Should the response phase of the request roundtrip be included in the log payload or not ?

enabled.description: Specify if Tracing is Enabled or not

verbose.description: Specify if Tracing is Verbose or not

categories.description: The list of categories the API belongs to.

consoleNotificationConfiguration.description: ConsoleNotification struct sent to the mAPI, not part of the CRD spec.

crossId.description:

definitionContext.description:
The API Definition context is used to identify the Kubernetes origin of the API,
and define whether...

origin.description: The definition context origin where the API definition is managed.

syncFrom.description: The syncFrom field defines where the gateways should source the API definition from.

definitionVersion.description: The definition version of the API.

endpoints.description: List of endpoint for the group

configuration.description: Endpoint Configuration, arbitrary map of key-values

inheritConfiguration.description: Should endpoint group configuration be inherited or not ?

name.description: The endpoint name (this value should be unique across endpoints)

configuration.description: Service Configuration, a map of arbitrary key-values

enabled.description: Is the service enabled or not ?

sharedConfigurationOverride.description: Endpoint Configuration Override, arbitrary map of key-values

headers.description: Endpoint group headers, arbitrary map of key-values

clearTextUpgrade.description: Should HTTP/2 clear text upgrade be used or not ?

connectTimeout.description: Connection timeout of the http connection

followRedirects.description: Should HTTP redirects be followed or not ?

idleTimeout.description: Idle Timeout for the http connection

keepAliveTimeout.description: Should keep alive be used for the HTTP connection ?

pipelining.description: Should HTTP/1.1 pipelining be used for the connection or not ?

useCompression.description: Should compression be used or not ?

version.description: HTTP Protocol Version (Possible values Http1 or Http2)

configuration.description: Service Configuration, a map of arbitrary key-values

enabled.description: Is the service enabled or not ?

enabled.description: Is the service enabled or not ?

ssl.description: Endpoint group http client SSL options

keyStore.description: KeyStore type (possible values PEM, PKCS12, JKS)

certPath.description: KeyStore cert path (Only applicable for PEM KeyStore)

content.description: The base64 encoded trustStore content, if not relying on a path to a file

type.description: The KeyStore type to use (possible values are PEM, PKCS12, JKS)

password.description: TrustStore password (Not applicable for PEM TrustStore)

type.description: The TrustStore type to use (possible values are PEM, PKCS12, JKS)

enabled.description: API Failover is enabled?

status.description: ApiV4DefinitionStatus defines the observed state of API Definition.

conditions.description: Conditions describe the current conditions of the API.

items.description: Condition contains details for one aspect of the current state of this API Resource.

lastTransitionTime.description: lastTransitionTime is the last time the condition transitioned from one status to another.

message.description: message is a human readable message indicating details about the transition.

observedGeneration.description: observedGeneration represents the .metadata.generation that the condition was set based upon.

reason.description: reason contains a programmatic identifier indicating the reason for the condition's last transition.

status.description: status of the condition, one of True, False, Unknown.

type.description: type of condition in CamelCase or in foo.example.com/CamelCase.

crossId.description: The Cross ID is used to identify an API that has been promoted from one environment to another.

environmentId.description: The environment ID, if a management context has been defined to sync with an APIM instance

errors.description:
When API has been created regardless of errors, this field is
